content.text:
# List of Major League Baseball career WAR leaders

This is a list of Major League Baseball (MLB) players to have accumulated a value of 50 or more career Wins Above Replacement (WAR) using the Baseball Reference calculation.}} As through 2025 Major League Baseball season, 321 players have reached a WAR value of 50.0 or higher, as detailed on this list.
Babe Ruth is the all-time leader in WAR with a value of 182.6. Mike Trout is the active WAR leader with 87.5.
Key
{| class="wikitable"
| Rank || Rank amongst leaders in career Wins Above Replacement. A blank field indicates a tie.
|-
|Player (2025 WAR)||Name of the player. Amount of WAR accumulated during the 2025 MLB season
|-
|WAR||Total career Wins Above Replacement.
|-
!scope="row" style="background-color:#ffffbb"|*
|Denotes elected to National Baseball Hall of Fame.
|-
!scope="row" style="background:#cfecec;"|Bold
|Denotes active player.
|}
List
Stats updated through the end of the 2025 season.
